meanings.sent1: The cleaning solution had an ammoniacal smell.

meanings.definition: Emitting a strong, pungent odor like ammonia.
meanings.sent1: The trash can released an unpleasant, ammoniacal stench.
meanings.sent2: The bathroom cleaner left an unmistakable, sharp ammoniacal aroma.
meanings.sent3: The party guests wrinkled their noses at the strong, ammoniacal smell.
meanings.sent4: The old building had an eerie, ammoniacal atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The kitchen was filled with the acrid, ammoniacal scent of cleaning products.
